description:
These patches form an airtight, watertight repair that remains flexible in extreme temperatures and protects against abrasion, moisture, saltwater, and UV damage.Sticks to vinyl and vinyl-coated materials. Unique adhesive resists the oils in vinyl that cause other adhesives to fail.Functions from -29 to 60°C.
Contains:One 7.7 x 30.5cm patch.One 3.5 x 3.5cm patch.One 2.2 x 2.2cm patch.30.5cm reinforcement filament.Alcohol prep pads.Instructions and product repair list.
name: TearRepair Tear-Aid Repair Patch Type B
